languages.text: "Нет, наоборот! У нас никогда такой дисциплины не было. Вот только люди больно быстро помирают — по обе стороны решеток... Ваша Светлость, врать не буду — господина Антара уже убить пытались. Ненависть сильнее страха стала! Молю, заберите вы его отсюда".

"Quite the opposite! We have never enjoyed such strict discipline. Except, people are dying a bit too quickly... On both sides of the bars, I mean... Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there have been several attempts on Master Anthar's life. The hate has grown stronger than the fear! Take him away from here, I beg you. Please, take him away."
languages.original_text: "Нет, наоборот! У нас никогда такой дисциплины не было. Вот только люди больно быстро помирают — по обе стороны решеток... Ваша Светлость, врать не буду — господина Антара уже убить пытались. Ненависть сильнее страха стала! Молю, заберите вы его отсюда".

Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there have been several attempts of master Anthar's life. The hate has grown stronger than the fear! Take him away, I am begging you. Please take him away."

Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there have been several attempts on Master Anthar's life. The hate has grown stronger than the fear! Take him away from here, I beg you. Please, take him away."

languages.text: 「いえ、むしろその逆です！こんなに厳格な規律を享受したことはありません。それにしても、ちょっと人が死にすぎているのですが…檻の内と外の両側で、という意味です…閣下、マスター・アンサールの命を狙う試みがいくつかありました。憎しみが恐怖よりも強くなっています！どうか、彼をここから連れて行ってください。お願いです、どうか連れて行ってください」
languages.original_text: "Quite the opposite! We have never enjoyed such strict discipline. Except, people are dying a bit too quickly... On both sides of the bars, I mean... Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there have been several attempts on Master Anthar's life. The hate has grown stronger than the fear! Take him away from here, I beg you. Please, take him away."

traits.locale_text: 「いえ、むしろその逆です！こんなに厳格な規律を享受したことはありません。それにしても、ちょっと人が死にすぎているのですが…檻の内と外の両側で、という意味です…閣下、マスター・アンサールの命を狙う試みがいくつかありました。憎しみが恐怖よりも強くなっています！どうか、彼をここから連れて行ってください。お願いです、どうか連れて行ってください」

languages.text: "Ganz im Gegenteil! Wir hatten noch nie so viel strenge Disziplin. Allerdings sterben die Leute ein wenig zu schnell ... Auf beiden Seiten der Gitter ... Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} es gab schon mehrere Anschläge auf Meister Anthars Leben. Der Hass ist mittlerweile größer als die Angst! Bringt ihn weg von hier, ich flehe Euch an. Bitte bringt ihn weg."
languages.original_text: "Quite the opposite! We have never enjoyed such strict discipline. Except, people are dying a bit too quickly... On both sides of the bars, I mean... Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there have been several attempts on Master Anthar's life. The hate has grown stronger than the fear! Take him away from here, I beg you. Please, take him away."

traits.locale_text: "Ganz im Gegenteil! Wir hatten noch nie so viel strenge Disziplin. Allerdings sterben die Leute ein wenig zu schnell ... Auf beiden Seiten der Gitter ... Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} es gab schon mehrere Anschläge auf Meister Anthars Leben. Der Hass ist mittlerweile größer als die Angst! Bringt ihn weg von hier, ich flehe Euch an. Bitte bringt ihn weg."

languages.text: « Au contraire ! Nous n'avions jamais bénéficié d'une telle discipline. Le seul problème, c'est que ce système engendre de nombreux décès... Dans les deux camps, si je puis dire... Votre Seigneurie, plusieurs personnes ont essayé d'attenter à la vie de maître Anthar. La haine a surpassé la peur ! Je vous en prie, emmenez-le loin d'ici. Je vous en prie ! »
languages.original_text: "Quite the opposite! We have never enjoyed such strict discipline. Except, people are dying a bit too quickly... On both sides of the bars, I mean... Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there have been several attempts on Master Anthar's life. The hate has grown stronger than the fear! Take him away from here, I beg you. Please, take him away."

traits.locale_text: « Au contraire ! Nous n'avions jamais bénéficié d'une telle discipline. Le seul problème, c'est que ce système engendre de nombreux décès... Dans les deux camps, si je puis dire... Votre Seigneurie, plusieurs personnes ont essayé d'attenter à la vie de maître Anthar. La haine a surpassé la peur ! Je vous en prie, emmenez-le loin d'ici. Je vous en prie ! »

languages.text: «¡Todo lo contrario! Jamás habíamos disfrutado de una disciplina tan estricta. Lo que pasa es que ahora se muere la gente a porrillo... a ambos lados de los barrotes, quiero decir... {mf|Milord|Milady}, ha habido varios atentados contra la vida de maese Anthar. ¡El odio se impone al miedo! Lléveselo de aquí, se lo suplico. Lléveselo ya».
languages.original_text: "Quite the opposite! We have never enjoyed such strict discipline. Except, people are dying a bit too quickly... On both sides of the bars, I mean... Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there have been several attempts on Master Anthar's life. The hate has grown stronger than the fear! Take him away from here, I beg you. Please, take him away."

traits.locale_text: «¡Todo lo contrario! Jamás habíamos disfrutado de una disciplina tan estricta. Lo que pasa es que ahora se muere la gente a porrillo... a ambos lados de los barrotes, quiero decir... {mf|Milord|Milady}, ha habido varios atentados contra la vida de maese Anthar. ¡El odio se impone al miedo! Lléveselo de aquí, se lo suplico. Lléveselo ya».

languages.text: “恰恰相反！这里的纪律情况从来没像现在这么好过，只是人们死得有点太快了……我是说，不仅仅是关在里面的人，外面的人也一样……大人，有好几次，有人打算谋害安萨大师的性命。人们对他的仇恨已经超出对他的恐惧了！大人，求您带他离开这里吧，我求求您了。”
languages.original_text: "Quite the opposite! We have never enjoyed such strict discipline. Except, people are dying a bit too quickly... On both sides of the bars, I mean... Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there have been several attempts on Master Anthar's life. The hate has grown stronger than the fear! Take him away from here, I beg you. Please, take him away."

traits.locale_text: “恰恰相反！这里的纪律情况从来没像现在这么好过，只是人们死得有点太快了……我是说，不仅仅是关在里面的人，外面的人也一样……大人，有好几次，有人打算谋害安萨大师的性命。人们对他的仇恨已经超出对他的恐惧了！大人，求您带他离开这里吧，我求求您了。”

languages.text: "Tam aksine! Daha önce hiç böylesi sıkı bir disiplinimiz olmamıştı. Ancak sürekli birileri ölüyor... Üstelik parmaklıkların iki tarafında da. Birkaç kez Üstat Anthar'ın canına kastedenler bile oldu {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İnsanların nefretleri korkularını geçti! Yalvarırım onu buradan alıp götürün."
languages.original_text: "Quite the opposite! We have never enjoyed such strict discipline. Except, people are dying a bit too quickly... On both sides of the bars, I mean... Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there have been several attempts on Master Anthar's life. The hate has grown stronger than the fear! Take him away from here, I beg you. Please, take him away."

traits.locale_text: "Tam aksine! Daha önce hiç böylesi sıkı bir disiplinimiz olmamıştı. Ancak sürekli birileri ölüyor... Hem de parmaklıkların iki tarafında da. Birkaç kez Efendi Anthar'ın canına kastedenler bile oldu {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İnsanların nefretleri korkularını geçti! Yalvarırım onu buradan alın. Alın götürün lütfen."
